   "source": [
    "# plotting hours vs score\n",
    "data.plot(x='Hours',y='Scores',style=\".\")\n",

    "plt.xlabel('Hours')\n",

   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "dfef9b36",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Splitting the dataset"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "id": "39ffc790",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "x = data[['Hours']]\n",
    "y = data.drop('Hours',axis = 1)\n",
    "# splitting the data into training and testing(8:2)\n",
    "from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split\n",
    "x_train,x_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(x,y,test_size=0.2,random_state=0)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "id": "4db8729d",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "((20, 1), (5, 1))"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 11,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x_train.shape,x_test.shape"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "68a64fa7",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Training the data"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "id": "bfbe3b72",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "LinearRegression()"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 12,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# importing the linear regression\n",
    "from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression\n",
    "model = LinearRegression()\n",
    "model.fit(x_train,y_train)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "id": "e6276df7",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# plotting the regression line\n",
    "line = model.coef_*x+model.intercept_\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.scatter(x,y)\n",
    "plt.plot(x,line)\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "fd1eaced",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Prediction and evaluation"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 14,
   "id": "cf5593c5",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#prediction using model\n",
    "\n",
    "y_train_prediction = model.predict(x_train)\n",
    "y_test_prediction = model.predict(x_test)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "id": "4a4855f3",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# calculating accuracy of model\n",
    "acc_train = model.score(x_train,y_train)\n",
    "acc_test = model.score(x_test,y_test)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "id": "158c3420",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# calculating root mean square error\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error\n",
    "rms_train = np.sqrt(mean_squared_error(y_train,y_train_prediction))\n",
    "rms_test = np.sqrt(mean_squared_error(y_test,y_test_prediction))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 17,
   "id": "bd01bed2",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "LINEAR REGRESSION MODEL:\n",
      "ACCURACY OF TRAINING DATASET: 0.9515510725211552\n",
      "ACCURACY OF TESTING DATASET: 0.9454906892105356\n",
      "RMSE OF TRAINING DATASET: 5.558613350226342\n",
      "RMSE OF TESTING DATASET: 4.6474476121003665\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "print(\"LINEAR REGRESSION MODEL:\")\n",
    "print(\"ACCURACY OF TRAINING DATASET:\",acc_train)\n",
    "print(\"ACCURACY OF TESTING DATASET:\",acc_test)\n",
    "print(\"RMSE OF TRAINING DATASET:\",rms_train)\n",
    "print(\"RMSE OF TESTING DATASET:\",rms_test)"
   ]
  },
